response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "events": [
        {
            "_id": "65ed989c24e85e76f3f8baf8",
            "name": "SAMSUNG Galaxy A52 (Awesome Blue, 128 GB)",
            "description": "Bring home the Samsung Galaxy A52 smartphone to enjoy viewing sharp visuals, click clear images, record stable videos, and do more. Its rear camera setup, with OIS, helps you capture clear shots. While its 16.40 cm (6.5) FHD+ Super AMOLED display delivers vivid visuals, the Eye Comfort Shield ensures reduced blue light emissions, thereby preventing eye strain.\n",
            "category": "Mobile and Tablets",
            "start_Date": "2024-03-10T00:00:00.000Z",
            "Finish_Date": "2024-03-13T00:00:00.000Z",
            "status": "Running",
            "tags": "SAMSUNG",
            "originalPrice": 27999,
            "discountPrice": 25999,
            "stock": 99,
            "images": [
